title: Porsche’s Macan EV comes out in 2024—we drive the prototype
description: Expect engaging handling and very fast charging when it goes on sale next year.

title: Unity CEO John Riccitiello is retiring, effective immediately
description: Former EA CEO will be replaced in interim by James Whitehurst from IBM/Red Hat.

title: Thousands of WordPress sites have been hacked through tagDiv plugin vulnerability
description: If a site is redirecting visitors to scam sites, it was likely hacked by Balada.

title: “Church of Bleach” family gets years in prison for deadly “miracle” solution
description: Convicted fraudster Mark Grenon claimed he was the victim and US should pay him $5.7M.

description: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days are coming, but you can already find savings at these retailers.

title: Report: Apple is already designing a lighter Vision Pro to fix “neck strain”
description: Vision Pro isn't out until early 2024, but next-gen plans are already underway.

title: Maya reservoirs relied on aquatic plants like water lilies to help keep water clean
description: Aquatic biota essentially served as self-cleaning "constructed wetlands."

title: Tired of shortages, OpenAI considers making its own AI chips
description: At an estimated 4 cents per ChatGPT query, OpenAI looks for cheaper AI chip solutions.

title: Striking UAW workers win key battery plant concession from General Motors
description: Further walkouts at GM factories were averted after the automaker made its offer.

title: Spanish company’s success comes at a critical time for Europe’s launch industry
description: "This launch culminates over 12 years of relentless effort."

title: Net neutrality’s court fate depends on whether broadband is “telecommunications”
description: We dig deep into how Supreme Court's "major questions doctrine" could affect FCC.
